response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which I believe has the potential to significantly impact and benefit your business. Given its unique features and capabilities, I estimate its value to be well above $1,500,000. Considering its exceptional quality and the long-term benefits it offers, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product at a special introductory price of $2,000,000. This is an exclusive offer tailored to recognize your position in the market and your potential to maximize the product's full potential. I look forward to discussing how this investment could propel your business forward. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer.", "product_price": 2000000}
